name: Introduction to Film Studies
description: Introduces students to the field of Film Studies, including its history, theory, and critical approaches to analyzing film.

name: History of World Cinema
description: Explores the history of world cinema, focusing on the development of film language, film genres, and the history of cinema from a variety of international perspectives.

name: Film Aesthetics and Analysis
description: Introduces students to the visual and narrative elements of film and provides an in-depth exploration of the fundamentals of film analysis.

name: Film Genres and Theory
description: Explores the history and development of various film genres and provides an introduction to film theory.

name: Film Theory and Criticism
description: Explores the various theoretical and critical approaches to analyzing film, including formalism, psychoanalysis, and post-structuralism.
